titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the La Roy Sunderland Autograph and Lecture Ticket, undated RL.11458
titlestmt.author: Alice Poffinberger

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2017-04-28 15:51:10 -0400.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: La Roy Sunderland autograph and lecture ticket
did.abstract: La Roy Sunderland was a minister and abolitionist. Collection comprises one page with a clipped autograph for Sunderland, along with a ticket for his lecture "On Pathetism."

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: La Roy Sunderland was a minister and abolitionist.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The La Roy Sunderland Autograph and Lecture Ticket were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a purchase in 2016.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], La Roy Sunderland Autograph and Lecture Ticket, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessions described in this collection guide: 2016-0191

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection comprises one page with a clipped autograph for Sunderland, along with a ticket for his lecture "On Pathetism."
